author: morciuch
msg: More fixes related to Bugzilla issue 14907:
1. All hidden registry browsers and admin portlets are made visible but to admin role only (this way admins can better customize their profile).
2. PsmlBrowser is now available to admin role only.
3. Administrative Portlets is only available to admin role.
4. Psml form is made invisible as it works only in conjunction with PsmlBrowser.
5. AdminScreen is made invisible because it's obsolete.

author: taylor
msg: im removing the ability to add refs unless the user has the admin role for 2 reasons:
1. i believe ive fixed all the security holes, but just in case i didn't,
i don't want to deal again with some asshole making a big security-buzzword noise for his 2 minutes of open source fame
2. there are a number of bugs related with references, best to get them fixed before letting average users at it
Once references are more stable, they should be enabled for the user role again

author: taylor
msg: - bug fix 15000, added more security to admin portlet sets, fixed bug in psml mapping for references

author: taylor
msg: bug fix 15000, passed on security ref to reference from referred portlets set
